original_text:
It is hidden from the eyes of every living thing,
    concealed even from the birds in the sky.
korean_text: 모든 생물의 눈에 숨겨졌고 공중의 새에게 가려졌으며

sentences.original_text: It is hidden from the eyes of every living thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 살아있는 생물의 눈으로부터 숨겨져 있으며

sentences.original_text: concealed even from the birds in the sky
